column5: A reminder to keep things safe as you head north this year.https://www.tbnewswatch.com/local-ne...k-lake-1514574

Every year we get this nearly identical post and it's a shame that it takes another person losing their life to make us pay attention. Several years ago two older fellows from out local area went overboard in Ontario. It was weeks recovering them as the boat had drifted miles.Anymore it seems most guys wear a PFD, but then most (ME...) don't slip the kill switch lanyard on when traveling.Always hate to hear of these things.Pooch
